name: Hunter X Hunter LORA (Style + Characters)
description:
LORA that gives Hunter X Hunter 2011 anime style along with some charcaters, it does mainly gon_freecss, killua_zoldyck, Hisoka, Kurapika, it possibly could do Leorio and Netero with some good prompting but i didn't train it on them much.

Although good prompting (describe appearance, clothes etc) is best even for the best trained character.

it was trained on Anything 4.5, but it should work relatively well on most anime models based on my experiments, my preferred weight is 0.5-0.6, might differ between models.

Have fun and please share your creations here !

maybe one day when SD animation capabilities are good enough, one of you will continue the anime haha

PS: The trigger word isn't entirely necessary, and sometimes you might actually get better results without it, so experiment and see how it goes.

Also, i found if you're doing many characters it's best to do low steps (12-18) then highres fix, otherwise the features will get jumbled up and you'll get clones. i don't know if this is specific of this lora,, or it's an sd thing in general.

meta.prompt: ((masterpiece, best quality)), Hisoka, 1boy, against_tree, blurry, bush, day, earrings, forest, grass, jewelry, male_focus, nature, on_grass, outdoors, pants, red_hair, sash, short_hair, sitting, solo, tree, clown,  <lora:hxh2011:0.52>
